org.diirt.util.array

Class ArrayDouble

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diirt.util.array.ListDouble
      • org.diirt.util.array.ArrayDouble
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, CollectionDouble, CollectionNumber, ListNumber

    public final class ArrayDouble
extends ListDouble
implements Serializable
    Wraps a double[] into a ListDouble.
    Author:
    Gabriele Carcassi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
